meanings.definition: A monosaccharide containing seven carbon atoms.
meanings.sent1: The heptose is a type of sugar with seven carbon atoms.
meanings.sent2: Scientists are studying the structure of the heptose to understand its properties better.
meanings.sent3: The heptose walked into the glucose party and felt out of place with its seven carbon atoms.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity was like a heptose, unique and made up of seven distinct parts.
meanings.sent5: The heptose molecule, with its seven carbon atoms, stood out under the microscope.
